contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox anthem |title = O Land of Beauty! |alt_title = National Anthem of the Federation of Saint Christopher and Nevis |image = Flag of Saint Kitts and Nevis.svg |image_size = |border = |caption = |prefix = National |country = {{KNA}} |author = Kenrick Georges |lyrics_date = |composer = Kenrick Georges |music_date = |adopted = 1983 |until = |sound = United_States_Navy_Band_-_O_Land_of_Beauty.ogg |sound_title = O Land of Beauty (Instrumental) <ref group="note">http://www.nationalanthems.info/kn.htm</ref> }} "'''O Land of Beauty!'''" is the [[national anthem]] of the [[Saint Kitts and Nevis|Federation of Saint Kitts and Nevis]]. Written and Composed by Kenrick Georges, it became officially adopted as the national anthem of the newly independent nation in 1983, when the federation received its independence from [[United Kingdom|Great Britain]]. ==Lyrics== :O Land of Beauty! :Our country where peace abounds, :Thy children stand free :On the strength of will and love. :With God in all our struggles, :Saint Kitts and Nevis be :A nation bound together, :With a common destiny. :As stalwarts we stand :For justice and liberty. :With wisdom and truth :We will serve and honour thee. :No sword nor spear can conquer :For God will sure defend. :His blessings shall forever :To posterity extend. ==References== {{Reflist|group=note}} ==External links== *[http://www.navyband.navy.mil/anthems/ANTHEMS/St.%20Kitt's%20and%20Nevis.mp3 Listen to ''O Land of Beauty'' (instrumental version, mp3)] *[http://nationalanthems.me/saint-kitts-and-nevis-o-land-of-beauty/ Information, links and streaming audio for the St. Kitts and Nevis national anthem] {{National Anthems of North America}} {{Nationalanthemsofthecaribbeanislands}} [[Category:National symbols of Saint Kitts and Nevis]] [[Category:Saint Kitts and Nevis music]] [[Category:National anthems]] {{SaintKittsNevis-stub}} {{anthem-stub}}
